metadata.title: Russia to Welcome Indian Exports Amid 50% US Tariffs, Slams Oil Duties as ‘Unjustified Pressure’

left: Russia will welcome Indian goods if there are barriers to the US market, according to Roman Babushkin of the Russian Embassy in India.
Babushkin stated that unilateral actions could disrupt supply chains and threaten energy security for developing countries.
The Indian government condemned the actions as 'unfair, unjustified and unreasonable'.
Babushkin emphasized the 'true strategic partnership' between Russia and India.
